text: Rodríguez at the 2012 Olympic Games Álvaro Rodríguez Melero (born May 25, 1987 in Valladolid) is a Spanish middle distance runner. He represented his country in the 1500 metres at the 2012 Summer Olympics without advancing from the first round. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2005 |European Junior Championships |Kaunas, Lithuania |12th |1500 m |DNF |- |rowspan=2|2006 |rowspan=2|World Junior Championships |rowspan=2|Beijing, China |7th |1500m |3:42.71 |- |14th (h) |4 × 400 m relay |3:16.56 |- |rowspan=2|2007 |European U23 Championships |Debrecen, Hungary |bgcolor=gold|1st |1500 m |3:44.00 |- |Universiade |Bangkok, Thailand |bgcolor=silver|2nd |1500 m |3:39.78 |- |rowspan=3|2009 |European Indoor Championships |Turin, Italy |7th |1500 m |3:46.86 |- |Mediterranean Games |Pescara, Italy |6th |1500 m |3:41.32 |- |European U23 Championships |Kaunas, Lithuania |4th |1500m |3:51.62 |- |2010 |World Indoor Championships |Doha, Qatar |13th (h) |1500 m |3:40.96 |- |rowspan=2|2012 |European Championships |Helsinki, Finland |15th (h) |1500 m |3:46.33 |- |Olympic Games |London, United Kingdom |28th (h) |1500 m |3:41.54 |- |2013 |European Indoor Championships |Gothenburg, Sweden |21st (h) |1500 m |3:49.10 |- |rowspan=2|2014 |IAAF World Relays |Nassau, Bahamas |5th |4 × 1500 m |15:00.69 |- |Ibero-American Championships |São Paulo, Brazil |bgcolor=silver|2nd |1500 m |3:43.91 |} ==References== * Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Valladolid Category:Spanish male middle-distance runners Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Olympic athletes of Spain Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade silver medalists for Spain Category:Medalists at the 2007 Summer Universiade
title: Álvaro Rodríguez (athlete)
